## M2989-240948 - Patrol Vessels Lindsay and Higgitt - Engine Installations


### Notice of Invitation to Tender

#### Background

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP), is issuing a request for proposal (RFP) for the installation of government-supplied engines on board the Patrol Vessels Higgitt and Lindsay.

#### Opportunity Details

*   **Procurement ID:** WS4044419474
*   **Solicitation ID:** WS4044419474
*   **Closing Date:** August 23, 2023, at 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
*   **Contract Period:** Expected start date: July 31, 2023; Expected end date: August 11, 2024
*   **Location:** British Columbia, Canada

#### Overview

The RCMP has a requirement for the installation of government-supplied engines on the Patrol Vessels Higgitt and Lindsay, with a work period of September 13, 2023, to November 22, 2023. An optional bidder's conference and site visit will be held in conjunction with this procurement.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The selection criteria for this procurement will be based solely on the lowest price.

#### Access to the Tender Document

The complete tender package can be accessed through the Government of Canada's electronic tender management system. Interested suppliers are required to create an account to access the document.

#### Contact Information

For further information or clarification on this tender process, suppliers are encouraged to contact Tracy Birtwistle by email at [tracy.birtwistle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tracy.birtwistle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
